title: BMaaS — 00 Executive Fleet Overview
description: Single-pane-of-glass for BMaaS fleet health. GPU status, NVLink domains, power/cooling, SLA uptime, and nodes requiring attention.

panels.title: Fleet Health Score
panels.description: Overall fleet health 0–100%. Composite of node availability, GPU health, and network fabric status.

panels.title: Node State Distribution
panels.description: How many nodes are UP / DOWN / CLOSED / BURNING? Any non-UP node reduces capacity.

panels.title: SLA Uptime
panels.description: Node availability over the SLA measurement window. Target: ≥ 99.9%.

panels.title: Critical Alerts
panels.description: Active critical alerts across the fleet.

panels.title: Warning Alerts
panels.description: Active warning alerts across the fleet.

panels.title: Info Alerts
panels.description: Active info alerts across the fleet.

panels.title: GPUs Healthy
panels.description: Number of GPUs in healthy state per NMX telemetry.

panels.title: GPUs Degraded
panels.description: Number of GPUs in degraded state per NMX telemetry.

panels.title: GPUs Unhealthy
panels.description: Number of GPUs in unhealthy state per NMX telemetry.

panels.title: NVLink Domains Healthy
panels.description: NVLink domains in healthy state. Unhealthy domains prevent multi-node jobs.

panels.title: NVLink Switches UP
panels.description: Active NVLink switches. DOWN switches reduce fabric bandwidth.

panels.title: NVLink Switches DOWN
panels.description: NVLink switches in DOWN state. Any > 0 = degraded fabric.

panels.title: PSU Health
panels.description: Healthy PSU ratio. < 1.0 = degraded power redundancy.

panels.title: CDU Avg Return Temp
panels.description: Average liquid cooling return temperature across CDUs.

panels.title: CDU Avg Flow Rate
panels.description: Average liquid flow rate. Low flow = reduced cooling capacity.

panels.title: ⚠️ Leak Detection
panels.description: Number of devices with active leaks. ANY > 0 = EMERGENCY.

panels.title: Total Power Draw
panels.description: Total power consumption across all circuits.

panels.title: Job Success Rate (24h)
panels.description: Percentage of jobs completed successfully in last 24 hours.

panels.title: Nodes Requiring Action
panels.description: Nodes with active issues: ECC DBE, row remap failure, critical XID, health check failures, thermal violations.

panels.title: Hardware Replacement Queue
panels.description: Nodes flagged for RMA based on ECC DBE > 0, row remap failure, or NVSwitch fatal errors.

panels.title: Node Availability Over Time
panels.description: Fraction of nodes reporting UP over time.

panels.title: GPU ECC Error Trend (Fleet)
panels.description: Fleet-wide SBE vs DBE trends. Rising SBE = early degradation.
